Item ID1432

A rune mace is a mace made of runite. It requires 40 Attack. It can be made at level 87 Smithing using one Rune bar.

It is currently the fifth-strongest mace in the game, surpassed by the Void knight mace, Dragon mace, Tzhaar-ket-em, and the Inquisitor's mace. It is the strongest free-to-play mace, other than the Barronite mace which has a higher crush and strength bonus, but a lower prayer bonus.

The rune mace can be purchased from Scavvo's Rune Store in the Champions' Guild for a price of 14,400 after obtaining 32 quest points.

[[File:Rune mace detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''rune mace''' is a [[mace]] made of [[runite equipment|runite]]. It requires 40 [[Attack]]. It can be made at level 87 [[Smithing]] using one [[Rune bar]].

It is currently the fifth-strongest mace in the game, surpassed by the [[Void knight mace]], [[Dragon mace]], [[Tzhaar-ket-em]], and the [[Inquisitor's mace]]. It is the strongest [[free-to-play]] mace, other than the [[Barronite mace]] which has a higher crush and strength bonus, but a lower prayer bonus.

The rune mace can be purchased from [[Scavvo's Rune Store]] in the [[Champions' Guild]] for a price of {{Coins|14400}} after obtaining 32 [[quest points]].
